page.title: 07H.G. PLEDGER (STORAGE) LTD.
page.content: {Pledgers}are a company who provide storage facilities in three buildings totalling 123,000 square feet, on a 4 acre site. A new building covering 30,000 square feet is being built. They have been based at Shipdham Airfield since 1955 and employ 9 people. They rent out the buildings and also provide transport and management facilities. One of the hangars is managed by{Colmans}who have 5 staff on site.{Colmans of Norwich store soft drinks, rice, spices, glass flour and packing materials. {Pledgers}also store goods for international companies, peanuts from Korea and saccarin oil for example. They store grain for the government and the intervention board, and have a laboratory on site. The stock is controlled with the help of a computer.
